verses.name: Psalms 119:36
verses.text: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to covetousness.

verses.name: Psalms 119:37
verses.text: Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; and quicken thou me in thy way.

verses.name: Psalms 119:38
verses.text: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.

verses.name: Psalms 119:39
verses.text: Turn away my reproach which I fear: for thy judgments are good.

verses.name: Psalms 119:40
verses.text: Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: quicken me in thy righteousness.

verses.name: Psalms 119:41
verses.text: Let thy mercies come also unto me, O Lord, even thy salvation, according to thy word.

verses.name: Psalms 119:42
verses.text: So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: for I trust in thy word.
